title: Akkineni Special on the Cards?
text:
Photos Superstar Akkineni Nagarjuna is flanked by his two sons Naga Chaitanya and Akhil, during the audio launch of VV Vinayak’s Akhil, which took place on the birth anniversary of the legendary Akkineni Nageswara Rao 
In a new twist to the much-awaited debut film of Akhil Akkineni, it has now been revealed that Akhil’s superstar father Nagarjuna and brother Naga Chaitanya will join the young actor for a special song in the film, also titled Akhil. 
The Akkineni trio were previously seen together in 2014 blockbuster film Manam, which was Akkineni Nageswara Rao’s last film. Considering it’s the debut film for Akhil, Nagarjuna had decided that a similar family appearance would be ideal, reveal sources. 
“It is a special song where Akhil will shake a leg with Nagarjuna and Naga Chaitanya. The song will have special effects and they will also pay a tribute to ANR garu. It will be an eye-feast for all Akkineni fans,” revealed a source. 
Directed by VV Vinayak, Akhil, is slated to hit screens on October 22.
